See The Java Language Specification, - * section {@jls 8.2}. - * @@ -2578,0 +2581,1 @@ + * @see #getConstructors() @@ -2739,1 +2743,1 @@ - * constructor of the class or interface represented by this + * constructor of the class represented by this @@ -2751,1 +2755,3 @@ - * @throws NoSuchMethodException if a matching method is not found. + * @throws NoSuchMethodException if a matching constructor is not found, + * including when this {@code Class} object represents + * an interface, a primitive type, an array class, or void. @@ -2773,0 +2779,1 @@ + * @see #getConstructor(Class[])
